mapper.insert: insert into Review (category, title, writer, content, menu, score) values (#{category} , #{title} , #{writer} , #{menu}, #{score} #{content})
mapper.update: update Review set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, score=#{score}, menu=#{menu} category=#{category} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from Review order by seq desc
